keyword: how many calories are in an uncrustable
title: How Many Calories Are in an Uncrustable?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in an uncrustable, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in an Uncrustable?
assumptions: Standard Smucker's Peanut Butter & Grape Jelly Uncrustable (58 g), thawed, no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand, exact size, and storage; check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One Uncrustable provides ~210 kcal, with 5 g protein and 24 g carbs from bread and fillings.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in an uncrustable?
faqs.a: About 210 kcal per standard Peanut Butter & Grape Jelly Uncrustable.

faqs.q: What are the macros in one uncrustable?
faqs.a: â‰ˆ24 g carbs, 10 g fat, 5 g protein, and 1 g fiber.
Typically 0 g trans fat per serving.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in an uncrustable?
faqs.a: Around 10 g total sugars from jelly and bread.
One has ~170 mg sodium, moderate for a snack.
